summary_detail.value: An information meeting for the Gibralter and Caribou fires will be held on Monday, September 4th at 7:00 pm at the Eureka High School Auditorium. Representatives from the Forest Service, Incident Management Team, Lincoln County Sherriff's Office, Border Patrol, Red Cross, and Emergency Management will all be present to provide information on both fires.

title: Eureka Public Meeting on 9/4 at 7:00 PM (Gibralter Ridge Fire Wildfire)
